item.description:
I will be hiking part of the route that we will be doing on Thursday. Group conscience will determine how far we go (at least 2.5 to 3 miles). I will also be looking for opportunities to get some photos before and after sunrise. Maybe breakfast afterwards.

Directions: Take exit 10 off Route 3. Go 1.8 miles on 3A North and turn left on Mayflower St. Go 1.2 miles to North Hill Marsh parking lot on right. I will be leaving the parking lot at exactly 5:30 AM.

Leader Bill McDonald 508-942-3800 (Cell).

Â
item.how_to_find_us: North Hill Marsh parking lot on Mayflower St., Duxbury

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Hike/Photo - Duxbury Conservation Lands
